attributes.action: participate in a televised debate with the leaders of the Conservative and Liberal Democrat parties on the BBC once a general election is announced
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: in order for the electorate to determine who should be Prime Minister once a general election is called, the public should have the opportunity to see and hear the leaders debate and put forward their policies.  In the interest of fairness, such a debate should be made available to the entire pubic, and as such should made available on the BBC.
